post_title: FS: T206 George Paige SL Charleston - Cracked out of SGC 3 Holder **SOLD**
post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 card for sale. I previously sold this card on eBay but had a non-paying bidder, so relisting it here for a quick sale.  This is a nice looking example of one of the tougher SL'ers, previously in a SGC 3 holder.

Card is SOLD.  Thanks for looking!

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!
